sentences.sentence: You can get there just as cheaply by plane.
sentences.translation: 你坐飞机到那儿同样便宜。

sentences.sentence: I'm sure I could buy this more cheaply somewhere else.
sentences.translation: 我相信我能在别的地方更便宜地买到这种物品。

sentences.sentence: It will produce electricity more cheaply than a nuclear plant.
sentences.translation: 它将以比核电厂更低廉的成本生产电力。
